title: Marykeller
author: Marykeller
created_time: January 06, 2023, 03:14:18 PMLast edit: January 06, 2023, 03:26:54 PM by Marykeller
content: When a law is given in a country, nobody suppose dey above am no mata what. As the world d so, the law wey the government of a country d implement for their country, d people wey em d affect most na the poor citizens. Why I d talk so na because in Saudi Arabia it is forbidden for couples wey never marry to live together no matter what. But em reach C. Ronaldo turn based on sae na GOAT, em wan come play football for Saudi Arabia. Saudi Arabia don bend their marriage law because of am. That means sae them they accept make C. Ronaldo and his girl friend (Rodriguez) live together be that. Despite knowing fully well sae em never marry amOnly this new incident wey happen for Saudi Arabia alone, don make me to fully understand the reason why peso need to be relevant for the world or for em own country.Abegy in all of this, make we try make up your mind to be relevant for the world or for our own country at least. E get whylink For the ogbegi information https://punchng.com/saudi-arabia-bends-marriage-law-for-ronaldo-partner/?utm_medium=Social&utm_source=Facebook#Echobox=1673001368

comments.author: Frankolala
comments.body: OP true talk, Saudi Arabia just dey do everything to make sure say Ronaldo use e church mind play for the country and to make am happy so that he no go commot for Al Nassr. Anything we you dey do just try bring out the best in you by adding more effort and hard work. All when you go dey sacrifice,no reason am because benefit dey front dey wait for you to come meet am. Ronaldo self don try for football so na e talent be Saudi Arabia mumu button.Though,oil wey dey your head follow,if you look Ronaldo excess oil dey him head,imagine how much this Arab nation dey pay am. Make we forget trophy and titles Ronaldo don flex money pass Messi,one million times.

comments.author: sokani
comments.body: Saudi Arabia na the strictest Arab nation in the world and when it comes to their Sharia law dem no dey use am play. From wetin I hear, u no fit waka with woman for street wey no be your wife, a doctor no fit attend to a woman patient without the husband or family member being present and other laws like that. But las las dem bend their law for the GOAT. That's good!

comments.author: KupaCrypto
comments.body: To they relevant goes well oo, E sweet my brother,  everybody go dey look up to you, you go get plenty fans and followers for social media, anything wey you talk go travel very far in less than no time, and you go get influence. Ronaldo go Saudi Arabia where Mecca they but dem bend marriage law becos of am, Digital satellite television wey dem they call DSTV done open channel to show Saudi Arabian leagues live,  that's the influence of Cristiano Ronaldo, and anytin wey concern am em fans dey carry am for head, that team em go now done get social media followers pass teams like Napoli and Roma for Europe.

comments.author: Dzwaafu11
comments.body: E good make person they Relevant nobody go disrespect you, you go get fans for everywhere, and everywhere you go try obey the rules and regulation guiding that exact place wey you they, saudi arebia get money bad bad na him make them spend for Christiano Ronaldo so that him go enjoy their pass and make him no even reason to live there club. I like the way that Saudi they run there things oh no stress just obey the rules you go they peaceful

comments.author: Cryptomultiplier
comments.body: Na only people wey don attain the height of their career by honing their skill or by being valuable in a particular sector overtime, na em fit enjoy most of the privileges of having the law bended for them. Person like Christiano Ronaldo, at this him level no be person wey go stay another Continent, mostly one as strict as Saudi Arabia without his lover or family. Am sure e dey him agreement/contract wey him sign with the club before him come.Na business carry am go there and am sure security or escort go dey follow am so as to prevent him from breaking major laws.E dey very advantageous to dey relevant in the world, mostly when you get a particular marketable and money generating skill set, wey distinguish you from others.

comments.author: Zaguru12
comments.body: Seriously na relevant people wey na him dem Dey bend law for but for Ronaldo side he get watin dem Dey look. Georgina no just girlfriend to Ronaldo but na also mother to some of him children and for Arab once the parents don gree give you the girl to marry and both families witness this thing then una don bind together as husband wife no be till una gather masses chop rice. If you look some of our Yoruba’s dem Dey do this kind thing, na like when children don reach 2 na him people Dey gather. As long imam don bless the two toh dem don turn husband and wife. Even if you divorce woman and u still carry her in make she Dey take care of your children, Arabs no frown on top. But las las dem just do am because na CR7 but this Ronaldo girlfriend matter different from random girls wey una Dey reason like that because na mother to him children so dem get concrete reason to allow am

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: Quote from: Marykeller on January 06, 2023, 03:14:18 PMAbegy in all of this, make we try make up your mind to be relevant for the world or for our own country at least. E get why Brother no allow the story worry you much, do understand say when something wan change or God when free him people from bondage, na one person him dey use liberate a generation. Maybe God when use Ronaldo take help the Saudi Arabians because those people dey suffer better oppression, make we dey forgot all the money we dey see online na just very few percentage and foreigners get am. The vast majority dey in poverty and just dey survive. Maybe if dem go ahead give Ronaldo free pass e go rise protest and the whole world go support them and them fit force the government to change the law for everybody and maybe amend other laws as well. But wetin dey do Ronaldo self wetin him dey wait for to wife dat girl abi him no like her. Make him run secret marriage as Davido do for chioma na. Make him no go leave dat woman at the end of the day oh.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: Every person in the world is relevant in their own discipline, but speaking of becoming a public figure, that is what makes the individual matter most in the society they live in. Like the GOAT you used as your example, he is a public figure; his name is on the lips of millions of fans, and that is just how he has built it and how Grace exploited him. It's good to be super relevant, but some people don't have the zeal. So what?  Man just gat to keep pushing.I discovered that some individuals in high positions tend to bend the rules a little in some situations.

comments.author: DaNNy001
comments.body: This really suprises me because i was lead to know that no one actually is above the law and a whole law in a country is bent because of one very relevant individual .5 Truly saying that is a very good personality and have deserve all this golry his.Ronaldo na person na person wey don make name for the football world and is very relevant to the game of football which na hin field but everyone dey sone how relevant for their feild.

comments.author: KupaCrypto
comments.body: Quote from: DaNNy001 on January 10, 2023, 10:24:33 PMThis really suprises me because i was lead to know that no one actually is above the law and a whole law in a country is bent because of one very relevant individual .5 Truly saying that is a very good personality and have deserve all this golry his.Ronaldo na person na person wey don make name for the football world and is very relevant to the game of football which na hin field but everyone dey sone how relevant for their feild. Omo for this life ehnn , make we try they successful o, success can bend anything in place for you,  Ronaldo no go gree move to that country without him girlfriend, so seperating him from his girlfriend no go make am happy at all , and you know when a player mind no dey and em no happy em no go give you the best , Ronaldo na legend for the game of football so make we no suprise becos legends are legends and then dey get some first class treatment.Outside him legendary status em move for Saudi Arabia done bring plenty deals come the country and e done also make people put eye on the country too.

comments.author: Davidvictorson
comments.body: Nor be lie you talk. E dey very important to dey relevant for good thing o. We need to emphasize that one. This one show say, anything dey possible. Laws are dynamic and not static. Na human beings wey make am na Dem fit still change or bend am to suit them. I hope say in the future them nor go Ben another one for another celeb?

comments.author: Belarge
comments.body: Na true you talk my brother, e good to dey relevant o, when you dey relevant e get protocols you go break or will be broken because of you, wetin you talk about C Ronaldo na pure truth, Saudi Arabia dey do everything possible to make sure say Ronaldo go dey happy and play for Al nasar, Dem break protocols for Ronaldo sake, if not by their laws Ronaldo no suppose to stay with woman wey en never marry yet na, And same thing applies to naija oo, laws no dey affect politicians and people wey get plenty plenty money, na only citizens like me and nai laws dey affect oo, because we no money and we no dey into politics too, it's well

comments.author: sotelorene
comments.body: Quote from: Marykeller on January 06, 2023, 03:14:18 PMWhen a law is given in a country, nobody suppose dey above am no mata what. As the world d so, the law wey the government of a country d implement for their country, d people wey em d affect most na the poor citizens. Why I d talk so na because in Saudi Arabia it is forbidden for couples wey never marry to live together no matter what. But em reach C. Ronaldo turn based on sae na GOAT, em wan come play football for Saudi Arabia. Saudi Arabia don bend their marriage law because of am. That means sae them they accept make C. Ronaldo and his girl friend (Rodriguez) live together be that. Despite knowing fully well sae em never marry amOnly this new incident wey happen for Saudi Arabia alone, don make me to fully understand the reason why peso need to be relevant for the world or for em own country.Abegy in all of this, make we try make up your mind to be relevant for the world or for our own country at least. E get whylink For the ogbegi information https://punchng.com/saudi-arabia-bends-marriage-law-for-ronaldo-partner/?utm_medium=Social&utm_source=Facebook#Echobox=1673001368 Well to dey relevant dey very necessary but no be only because say him dey relevant na waiting make dem no talk about am,   if you check well you go see say Saudi Arabia dey find something and through him dem go get that thing na waiting make them keep their mouth shut. If to say them no go get anything through him they for talk about the matter but they no get choice base on say they need something big.  Even if na u and dey no say through you dem fit achieve big something dey go allow you do ya thing, so waiting I wan tell you be say Saudi Arabia get target.

comments.author: KupaCrypto
comments.body: My brother money, fame and Influence go keep you relevant for this world, Relevance sweet , Na why most politicians for Nigeria no want commot for power , if you dey relevant for our society you go get access to plenty things , and a lifestyle wey you go enjoy, most persons carry their relevance negatively most time positively, but in all we suppose use our Relevance positively and to the growth and improvements of our immediate society, make e be better place,Some ways wey person fit get relevance for our society Na by, Religion, politics,  Music and acting, once you dey do well for this categories you go dey relevance for our society,

comments.author: Victorybit1
comments.body: Na so we see the world wey we dey leave so. The law dey only affect common people like us alone. The rich will make the law but them no dey follow am. See our case for Naija, how our leaders dey do anyhow, steal the public fund, even the one wey dem catch them no dey fit do anything. Overspeeding is not good but you go see governors and big people convoy dey speed even to the point of causing accident.

comments.author: Hewlet
comments.body: This talk just remind me of one conversation when our HOD been de tell us regarding the need tor engineers to also join politics. Until you calm down study wetin they govern the society, you fit just assume say getting money, fame or power an for selected few.If you have your way, get power, become influential and ensure that you have a voice that can be listened to. E get so many things when poor people no de allowed to imagine doing it but for the rich, and influential people, na normal something.If you de ph around this January when David ibeome wan organise him GLORY REIGN, you go see say them go block major road when on a normal, De no born you well to even reason to black that road for any programme. Normally Ronaldo na big influence for the world and I doubt say that kind thing fit happen because of am.
